mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cno, pno, u_id, w_date, quantity) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{pno}, #{u_id}, SYSDATE, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE pno = #{pno} AND u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE pno = #{pno} AND u_id = #{u_id}

SELECT customers_table.u_id, cart.cno, products_table.pno, products_table.p_name, products_table.p_price, products_table.p_content, cart.w_date, cart.quantity FROM customers_table JOIN cart ON customers_table.u_id = cart.u_id JOIN products_table ON cart.pno = products_table.pno WHERE customers_table.u_id = #{u_id}
